name: BibleNerdBlog
0:
”Alexa, open bible nerd blog”
”Alexa, ask bible nerd blog for the latest update”
”Alexa, start bible nerd blog”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bible nerd blog
des: Hear the latest blog posts from the Bible Nerd blog, brought to you by Steve Schramm Ministries. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
